description:
Need more calls to your business? Need more leads for you or your sales people to follow up with? Start utilizing the power of print classified ads.

In our modern high-tech world print classified ads are about as low-tech as you can get. Yet they are highly effective in generating calls and leads when used properly. Not to mention they are dirt cheap.

I have personally have been using classified ads for myself and for my clients for over a decade with excellent success. While I was in the mortgage business my classified ads generated more calls and leads than my boss's combined ad spend on the yellow pages, print, radio, tv and direct mail. And I only spent a tiny fraction of what he did.

In this 2.5 hour video course we will take you step by step and show you how to use this underutilized and under-appreciated method of marketing and advertising.

Once you have completed this course you will understand and know exactly how to use classified ads in several different ways to market and advertise your business, services or products. This course gives you everything you need to know to be successful with classified advertising.
title: Easy Lead Generation With Cheap Print Classified Ads
